name: Awesome Cake Ice Cream Pie Dessert Bakery Maker
name_original: Awesome Cake Ice Cream Pie Dessert Bakery Maker
description:
Who's ready to make some Delicious Ice Cream Cakes!

Top Crazy Games is bringing you the best cooking and baking game with all of your favorite cake recipes. Play and make your own today!

Features:
- Choose your cake style: Single , double
- Choose your favorite flavors
- Drag ingredients and mix with mixer
- Decorate your cupcake
- EAT IT! EAT IT AGAIN AND AGAIN!

Dozens to choose from:
- Styles
- Flavors
- Decorations: frosting, candy, sprinkles, candles, fruit
- and More!!!!!

Play it for yourself. Who doesnt like to bake for the sweet tooth!

Download Awesome Cake Ice Cream Pie Dessert Bakery Maker right now and have fun making and mixing!

PLEASE NOTE:
- Awesome Cake Cream Pie Dessert Bakery Maker is free to play but in app purchases charges real money within the app. You can adjust your device settings to deactivate in app purchasing.
